data.text: @NYCHealthCommr Covid has a 99% survival rate. I had it in 2020, stayed away from the hospitals. 2yrs later I'm Unvaxxed and covid free. I don't wear masks and I dont follow cdc guidelines. And here I am perfectly healthy. cant wait till y'all get arrested for crimes against humanity.
@NYCHealthCommr When are you gonna stop lying to the people? Scumbag pos
